name: Cursed Lands
description: Defeat the evil lurking in Castle Of N'Mar in this RPG/dating sim game. Recruit your team in any order you want, use the optional social talents to win the battles, play as male or female and fully customize your avatar. Five romance per gender, including the unique Naga Enok and Sylrissa!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 1Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card Storage: 150 MB available space
